resetYourPassword: Gadzirisa pasiwedhi yako yeakaundi yako yechancellorminus.com.
languageDescription: Zviri pasaiti nekudyidzana kweAI zvichashandisa mutauro waunoda.
noEmailAddress: Hapana kero yeemail yakawanikwa yeakaundi iyi.
checkYourInbox: Ndapota tarisa inbox yako kuti uwane mirairo yekugadzirisa pasiwedhi yako.
iChancellorWelcome: Mhoro, ndini iChancellor. Ndiri pano kuti ndikutsigire munzira yako yekuva neutano hwakanaka. Ndingakubatsira sei nhasi? Tinogona kukurukura nezvekufunga zvakadzama, tsika dzakanaka, kana kutanga kufungisisa kunotungamirirwa.
pageTitle: Chancellor Minus | Muzvinabhizimisi, Injiniya weAI & Mugadziri Akazara
pageDescription: Portfolio yakazara inoshandisa AI inoratidza mapurojekiti nehunyanzvi hwaChancellor Minus.
landingTitle: Ramangwana reAgentic neGenerative AI Development — Nhasi
landingSubtitle: Chancellor Minus | Muzvinabhizimisi, Injiniya weAI & Mugadziri Akazara
landingSearchPlaceholder: Tsvaga mapurojekiti... semuenzaniso 'Ongorora mapurojekiti eAI nekuvandudza aChancellor'
noProjectsFound: Hapana mapurojekiti akawanikwa e '{searchQuery}'. Edza kumwe kutsvaga.
ctaDescription: Nyoresa akaundi kuti uwane 'Upenyu Hwakanaka' — gedhi rako rekuenda kumasesheni ekufungisisa anotungamirirwa, rutsigiro rwehutano hwemunhu wega ne iChancellor – mubatsiri wako wehutano weAI, uye kuwana kwakakosha kuTech Insight Generator kuitira maonero matsva pane tekinoroji neutano.
adminDescription: Chengetedza vashandisi, tarisa zviitiko, uye tarisisa application.
reportingDescription: Gadzira mishumo pamusoro pekupindirana kwevashandisi neutano hwesisitimu. (Zviri Kuuya Nguva Pfupi)
affirmationsDescription: Gadzira chisimbiso chakanaka chekukukurudzira nekukukurudzira parwendo rwako rwekukura kwemunhu.
affirmationsInitialText: Dzvanya bhatani kuti ugadzire chisimbiso uye utange rwendo rwako.
affirmationError: Pakanga paine kanganiso pakugadzira chisimbiso. Ndapota edza zvakare.
aiAssistantTitle: Kubva paAI Concept kuenda kuProduction Reality
aiAssistantDescription: Ndinogadzira, ndinovaka, uye ndinowedzera mhinduro dzeAI dzakangwara dzinogadzirisa matambudziko akaoma ebhizimisi.
dashboardWelcome: Mauya, {name}! Sarudza musoro wenyaya kuti uwane ruzivo rwazvino rweAI.
techInsightDescription: Sarudza musoro wenyaya uye rega muongorori weAI akupe pfupiso nemazano.
insightPlaceholder: Ruzivo rwako rwakagadzirwa neAI ruchabuda pano.
loginDescription: Isa zvitupa zvako kuti uwane dashboard yako.
venturesDescription: Chiratidzo chemakambani anoshandisa AI nezvigadzirwa zvandakavaka.
createAccountAndVerify: Akaundi yako yagadzirwa! Ndapota tarisa email yako kuti uone akaundi yako.
aiAssistantWelcome: Mhoro! Ndiri mubatsiri weAI waChancellor. Ndibvunze chero chinhu pamusoro pehunyanzvi hwake neruzivo rwake.
activeUsersDescription: Tarisa vashandisi vari kushanda parizvino pasaiti.
auditLogsDescription: Tevera zviitiko zvakakosha nezviito muapplication yese.
caseStudyDescription: Iyi nyaya yehunyanzvi yakagadzirwa nemubatsiri weAI.
contactDescription: Une mubvunzo here kana kuti unoda kushanda pamwe chete? Nditumire meseji.
healthyLivingDescription: Mubatsiri wako mukufunga, hutano, nekukura kwemunhu.
skillsDescription: Kutarisa tekinoroji dzandinoshanda nadzo kuunza pfungwa kuhupenyu, kubva kumberi kusvika pakutumirwa.
transcriberDescription: Rekodha kana kurodha odhiyo kuti uishandure uchishandisa Whisper yeOpenAI.
noAudioDescription: Ndapota rekodha kana kurodha faira reodhiyo kutanga.
affirmationPrompt: Ngatigadzire zvisimbiso zvanhasi kuti tipfungwa dzako dziite pakati uye tikurudzire zvakanakisisa zvako.
